ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESGOProject.GID AS GID, ESGOProject.Code AS Code, ESGOProject.Name AS Name, ESGOProject.FinishDate AS FinishDate, ESGOProject.StartDate AS StartDate, ESGOProject.fTradeAccountGID AS fTradeAccountGID, ESGOProject.Code+'/'+ESGOProject.Name AS Display FROM ESGOProject AS ESGOProject WHERE (ESEqual(ESGOProject.fTradeAccountGID, @fTradeAccountGID))
